page.title: 14ELECTRICAL APPLIANCES,ANNAN
page.content: Our class made a list of electrical appliances used in the home to show which gadgets were most commonly used and considered necessary to modern every day life.We decided to conduct a survey among housewives.Thirty five appliances were listed.Their results were as follows _ 1.{Number of appliances used,on { average,in the home each week}_ 19 2.{Most valued appliances}_ a)Washing machine 28% b)Cooker 25% c)Hoover 11% 3. {Appliance most desired }_ a)Microwave oven 30% b)Video Recorder,Freezer,Tumble Drier all 10% c)Computer,Dishwasher,Food Processor all 7% 4.{Appliance least desired }_ Electric toothbrush
